title: Gabriel Gate Cooks for Everybody
brief_description: This video brings together all of Gabriel Gate’s “Good Food” segments from the ABC TV’s “Everybody” program. In each segment, he examines one particular food group, and provides some tasty and healthy recipes using those ingredients.
